news.title: It’s Time to Build Ventilators Like We’re at War and Our Lives Depend on It
news.summary: On Thursday, the president said during his White House coronavirus briefing that “nobody in their wildest dreams would have ever though that we’d need tens of thousands of ventilators.” But this need has long been recognized.

news.title: Opinion | It’s Time to Build Ventilators Like We’re at War and Our Lives Depend on It

news.title: ‘Our lives will be changing’: Prolonged disruption likely as coronavirus spreads in Eastern Washington

news.title: Maintaining Progress Toward Accountable Care And Payment Reform During A Pandemic, Part 1: Utilization And Financial Impact
news.summary: The purpose of this two-part Health Affairs Blog post is to summarize impacts, issues, and policy implications due to the coronavirus pandemic for the largest payment reform program in the country: accountable care organizations (ACOs).

blogs.title: 'It's Taking Up My Entire Day': Hospitals Prepare For A Possible Wave Of Critical Coronavirus Patients
